price: Akasema: Enyi watu wangu! Kwa nini mnauhimiza uwovu kabla ya wema? Kwa nini hamuombi msamaha kwa Mwenyezi Mungu ili mrehemewe?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
footnotes: Swaleh akasema nao kuwanasihi: Enyi watu! Mbona mnaihimiza adhabu mlio ahidiwa kabla ya kutubu? Kwa nini hamwombi msamaha kwa Mola wenu Mlezi, mkamuamini Yeye kwa kutaraji akurehemuni?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
